article_title: Transparent Healthcare: the Costco of healthcare companies
article_text:

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Jennifer Reingold

twitter.title: Transparent Healthcare: the Costco for health insurance
twitter.description: Betty Heiman was the owner of a radiology practice in Yonkers when she got a strange call from an orthopedist she knew. He was trying to arrange an MRI for his mother, who was uninsured. “How...

article_metadata.keywords: mpw, venture, affordable care act, health insurance, healthcare, most powerful women, mpw co-chairs

article_metadata.sailthru.title: Transparent Healthcare: the Costco for health insurance
article_metadata.description: After seeing obstacles that the uninsured face, Betty Heiman created a company that hopes to make health care costs truly clear and affordable for everyone.
